pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, January 16, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local 

Toronto, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will attend an announcement by the Honourable Ahmed Hussen, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development and Minister responsible for Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation. John Tory, Mayor of Toronto, will also be in attendance.

Intersection of Lennox Street and Markham Street
Toronto, Ontario 

Notes for media:

  • There is an opportunity for a short site tour. Please bring safety boots as they are required.
